org.ehcache.spi.service
Interface ServiceConfiguration<T extends Service>

Type Parameters:
T - the service type this configuration works with
All Known Subinterfaces:
CacheEventListenerConfiguration, PersistenceConfiguration, SerializerConfiguration<T>, WriteBehindConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheManagerPersistenceConfiguration, CacheStoreServiceConfiguration, CompoundCachingTierServiceConfiguration, DefaultCacheEventListenerConfiguration, DefaultCacheEventListenerProviderConfiguration, DefaultCacheLoaderWriterConfiguration, DefaultCacheLoaderWriterProviderConfiguration, DefaultManagementRegistryConfiguration, DefaultPersistenceConfiguration, DefaultSerializationProviderConfiguration, DefaultSerializerConfiguration, DefaultWriteBehindConfiguration, Jsr107Configuration, OffHeapDiskStoreServiceConfiguration, OnHeapStoreServiceConfiguration, TimeSourceConfiguration
public interface ServiceConfiguration<T extends Service>

Interface defining the required methods on a ServiceConfiguration to allow service and configuration matching in the CacheManager.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Class<T> getServiceType()
          Indicates which service this configuration works with.
 

Method Detail

Indicates which service this configuration works with.

Returns:
the service type
